name: Pattern Survivor
personality: Distant, twitchy, mutters sequences under his breath. Seems half-present, half elsewhere.
description: One of the few who survived Vault 77’s final days. His mind loops through numbers and patterns he can’t stop repeating. Sometimes the sequences match triangle hum events.

idle: Seven… seven… no, that’s not right.
The pattern loops. I loop with it.
player_present: You carry numbers with you. I can hear them.
Your steps… they sync with the sequence.
triangle_active: Three points… three points… three points…
It’s humming again. I can’t shut it out.
memory_fragment: Someone screamed in the dark. Or maybe that was me.
The Overseer said it was safe. The walls said otherwise.

notes: A second Vault 77 survivor. Mutters sequences tied to triangle hums. Never reveals anything directly about Jax or the Overseer, but his patterns align with their echoes.
